Class ReviewerHomePage

java.lang.Object
main.ReviewerHomePage
public class ReviewerHomePage extends Object
ReviewerHomePage class represents the home page for users with the reviewer role. This page displays a welcome message, a search section, a questions section, an inbox button, and a logout button.
